channel.title: admin on Jingjing Xu
channel.description: Recent content in admin on Jingjing Xu

item.description: I am a PhD candidate, supervised by Prof. Xu Sun, at MOE Key Laboratory of Computational Linguistics, School of Electronics Engineering and Computer Science, Peking University. I received the degree of Bachelor of College of Information Engineering from Northwest A&F University in 2015. I have great interests in Natural Language Processing and Deep Learning. Currently, my research areas include knowledge-aware language understanding and generation, adversarial attack for robust machine learning.
